metadata.name: The Rise 🌔 & The Fall 🕳️
metadata.description:
The Rise 🌔  
The Fall 🕳️  

23.MARCH.23 /23 .23Ξ  

Dynamic crypto-art edition alternating between two animated .gif artworks, triggered reactively by The Rise and Fall of ETH price.  

A new, liminal SisyphusΞ, one who has escaped the eternal sentence of The Gods and found a way into his own world; by casting down the prescribed, accursed rock and taking instead The Moon into his hands and rolling on…  

From 23.April.23 onwards, this token may be burned-to-claim a handmade edition of either The Rise or The Fall; whichever artwork is displayed at the time of burn. Delivered with the novel Ermis protocol from Ēnosys - secure in total wallet anonymity and fully encrypted on-chain.  

[karborn.com](https://karborn.com/)  
[@johnkarborn](https://twitter.com/johnkarborn)
